original: 漢嘉郡旄牛夷首領，原本打算為被張嶷所殺的姑丈冬逢報仇，但因張嶷送回其姑姑，又誠心相待，終於冰釋前嫌，夷漢重歸於好，攜手合作。
text: The leader of Hanjia County, Nanniuyi, originally planned to avenge the uncle Dongfeng who was killed by Zhang Yi, but because Zhang Yi sent his aunt back to him and treated each other sincerely, he finally cleared his previous suspicions, Yihan and Han reconciled and cooperated together .
